definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The accident of aortic cannulation is very dangerous and the mortality of this complication is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 主動脈插管意外極爲兇險，死亡率非常高。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the effects of rapid double lumen tube intubation with rocuronium.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察羅庫溴銨用於快速雙腔氣管插管的作用。

sentences.english: The present study demonstrated that neuromuscular monitoring improved endotracheal intubating conditions.
sentences.chinese: 本研究顯示神經肌肉監測可改善插管條件。

sentences.english: When we want to intubate the patient, he turns out to have dentures in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 當我們想給他插管時，我們發現他的嘴裏裝有假牙。

sentences.english: Objective To provide anatomical data for the cannulation of the abdominal artery.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲臨牀腹部動脈插管提供有關的解剖學數據。

sentences.english: Sedation amnesia and slow induction in pernasal intubation was an effective way for the operation.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜健忘慢誘導經鼻插管是一種比較好的方法。

sentences.english: Methods The pelvis pressure was reduced through urine drainage from catheter under cystoscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法通過膀胱鏡輸尿管插管引流尿液使腎盂壓力降低。

sentences.english: It's hard to intubate. You want me to do that?
sentences.chinese: 很難插管的，你要讓我來做嗎？

sentences.english: Intramuscular succinylcholine does not provide satisfactory tracheal intubating condition in infants with congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 肌注琥珀膽鹼不能提供有效的肌松作用和插管條件。

sentences.english: Objectivee To explore the methods of increasing successful rate of urgent trachea intubation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討提高緊急氣管插管術成功的方式方法。

sentences.english: Effects of Supervision by Attending Anesthesiologists on Complications of Emergency Tracheal Intubation.
sentences.chinese: 由主治麻醉醫師監督處理緊急氣管插管併發症的效果。

sentences.english: The catheterization of portal vein by right gastro-omental vein was simple, with a few complications.
sentences.chinese: 經胃網膜右靜脈做門靜脈插管，方法簡單，併發症少。

sentences.english: Cardiac function was observed by left common carotid artery intubation.
sentences.chinese: 然後經左頸總動脈插管觀察大鼠的心臟功能。

sentences.english: Tracheal intubations were given after anesthesia induction and spontaneous respirations were retained.
sentences.chinese: 兩組患兒均麻醉誘導後氣管插管，保留自主呼吸。

sentences.english: I asked the second intern if he would like to try to intubate the patient.
sentences.chinese: 我問第二個實習他是否想嘗試給病人插管。

sentences.english: Cannula was intubated in the femoral vein for motilin injection.
sentences.chinese: 在一側股靜脈內置慢性靜脈插管供注射外源性胃動素。

definition: tracheotomy (abbr. for 氣管切開術|气管切开术[qi4 guan3 qie1 kai1 shu4])
general anesthetic/abbr. for 全身麻醉
intravenous infusion/to get put on an IV
